cleaned_text: Please note: The Department of State assumes no responsibility or liability for the professional ability or reputation of, or the quality of services provided by, the entities or individuals whose names appear on the following lists. Inclusion on this list is in no way an endorsement by the Department or the U.S. government. Names are listed alphabetically, and the order in which they appear has no other significance. The information on the list is provided directly by the local service providers; the Department is not in a position to vouch for such information. List of Medical Services: [List of Medical Services](https://bd.usembassy.gov/wp-content/uploads/sites/70/2022-June-List-of-Physicians-and-Hospitals.pdf)(PDF 324 KB) Medical Evacuation Information In instances where medical evacuation from Bangladesh is necessary, please refer to the list of Air Ambulance providers below. Note that the U.S. Embassy Dhaka does not endorse or make any representations for the services of any Medevac provider. If you are in need of medical evacuation and have any other concerns (such as passport validity), please contact the U.S. Embassy's American Citizen Services at (88) (02) 5566-2000 (If you are calling after work hours, please dial (88) (02) 5566-2000 and hear the recorded message please press "3", and you will be connected to the duty officer. For other general information on Medical Evacuation, please refer to the Department of State's website at ' [Your Health Abroad](https://travel.state.gov/content/passports/en/go/health.html)'. [List of Air Ambulance providers](https://bd.usembassy.gov/wp-content/uploads/sites/70/MedEvac-write-up-for-website-Dec-2022.pdf)(PDF 160 KB)
